attraction_reviewComments: Love to take the kids here for Halloween, lots of treats and the kids can run off their candy high. Well, worth the extra fee for this treat
What a fun place! I took my 3 year old niece to Fairytale Town last weekend and she had a blast. Special favorites were the Big Red Shoe slide and the animals!
This is a really fun stop for families. Even mom and dad can join in with the imaginative play. The park has plenty of room and excitement to keep kids busy.
Great place for young kids with a range of play and structures to about age 8. Nice hangout place for young families.

Great for children who are young and into nursery rhymes. Lots of opportunity for children to climb and move around.

This is a staple of Sacramento now. My children love all of the play structures, the plays and music from the stages and the seasonal activities. They have never wanted to leave.
